definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Isomers are defined as compounds having the same formula but different structures.
sentences.chinese: 異構體被定義爲化學式相同而結構不同的化合物。

sentences.english: At present, the dry type biochemistry analyzer was also more widespread application.
sentences.chinese: 目前，幹化學式生化分析儀也已得到較爲廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Galactose Organic compound, a monosaccharide, chemical formula C6H12O6.
sentences.chinese: 一種天然存在的單醣，化學式爲C6H12O6。

sentences.english: Liquefied gas formula being hit by a combustion in air?
sentences.chinese: 液化氣在空氣中燃燒的化學式？

sentences.english: He can never write chemical formulas correctly for chemical reactions.
sentences.chinese: 準確地寫出化學反應的化學式。

sentences.english: But as the pressure rises, now the chemical potential changes and goes up.
sentences.chinese: 但是當壓強升高的時候，化學式也會改變，上升。
